variable.name: bcr_patient_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual patient(public CDE id 2673794)

variable.name: additional_chemo_therapy
variable.description: The yes/no indicator related to the additional administration of chemotherapy after the return of a disease after a period of remission.(public CDE id 2650626)

variable.name: additional_drug_therapy
variable.description: Text term to signify the treatment of an individual with recurrent or progression disease with additional targeted therapy. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2786150)

variable.name: additional_hormone_therapy
variable.description: Indicator related to the additional administration of hormone therapy after the return of a disease after a period of remission

variable.name: additional_immuno_therapy
variable.description: The yes/No indicator for the administration of additional immunotherapy to an individual after the recurrence or progression of disease. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2759828)

variable.name: additional_pharmaceutical_therapy
variable.description: The yes/no indicator related to the additional administration of various treatment modalities that produce the desired therapeutic effect by means of change of hormone/hormones level after the return of a disease after a period of remission or new disease.(public CDE id 2650646)

variable.name: additional_radiation_therapy
variable.description: Text yes/no/unknown indicator to signify additional therapeutic application of radiation therapy after return of disease.(public CDE id 3008761)

variable.name: anatomic_organ_subdivision
variable.description: Detailed spatial description to provide the exact location of an anatomic site or location.(public CDE id 2008006)

variable.name: chemo_therapy
variable.description: Text term to indicate whether a patient has received adjuvant postoperative chemotherapy. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2756823)

variable.name: gender
variable.description: Gender of an individual(public CDE id 2200604)

variable.name: histological_type
variable.description: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis.(public CDE id 3081934)

variable.name: hormonal_therapy
variable.description: The yes/no/unknown indicator whether adjuvant hormone therapy was administered following surgery.(public CDE id 2199669)

variable.name: immuno_therapy
variable.description: Text term to indicate the administration of postoperative adjuvant immunotherapy to a patient prior to the current study/treatment. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2756814)

variable.name: informed_consent_verified
variable.description: Text term to signify whether or not a consent by a patient to permit the acquistion of tissue or bodily fluid has been obtained. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2714689)

variable.name: initial_pathologic_diagnosis_method
variable.description: Text name of the procedure to secure the tissue used for the original pathologic diagnosis [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2757941)

variable.name: person_neoplasm_cancer_status
variable.description: The state or condition of an individual's neoplasm at a particular point in time. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2759550)

variable.name: pretreatment_history
variable.description: The yes/no indicator to ask whether any treatment was given to the patient prior to surgery.(public CDE id 64176)

variable.name: prior_glioma
variable.description: Text term to signify if a person had an earlier diagnosis of glioma with a lower histological grade than the current disease grade. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2786111)

variable.name: radiation_therapy
variable.description: A yes/no indicator to ask if therapeutic application of radiation was initiated to treat disease following surgery to remove tumor and associated malignant tissue.(public CDE id 2005312)

variable.name: targeted_molecular_therapy
variable.description: Text term to signify postoperative adjuvant cancer therapies which use drugs to act upon specific molecules, metabolic pathways or processes involved in carcinogenesis, tumor growth, or tumor spread. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2785850)

variable.name: tumor_tissue_site
variable.description: Text term for originating or primary anatomic site of the disease/condition under investigation or review.(public CDE id 2735776)

variable.name: vital_status
variable.description: Text summary level description of patient/participant survival status.(public CDE id 2939553)

variable.name: year_of_initial_pathologic_diagnosis
variable.description: Numeric value to represent the year of an individual's initial pathologic diagnosis of cancer.(public CDE id 2896960)
